KINDERGARTEN SCREENINGS

Kindergarten Screenings will be held on August 20th, 21st, and 24th from 9:30 a.m. to 2:30 p.m. Kindergarten parents should have received a specific screening appointment for each child. Families will stay during the 30 minute assessment. Pictures and videos are prohibited by law during the screening session. Only 1 adult per child and no other siblings please. Last Names A-L: First Day of School is September 1, 2020
Last Names M-Z: First Day of School is September 2, 2020
All Kindergarten Students: September 3, 2020

CONGRATULATIONS MR. TONEY!

Amherst is excited to announce that Nick Toney will be the new Assistant Principal at Marion L. Steele High School pending Board approval on Monday, July 13th!

Mr. Toney grew up in the Elyria City Schools and attended Kent State University, where he earned a B.S. in Middle Childhood Education. He earned his M.A. in Educational Leadership from Concordia University and holds administrative licenses for high school, middle school, and elementary school levels.

This past school year marked Mr. Toney's fifth year in the classroom and his second year at Nord Middle School. Prior to teaching in Amherst, he taught in the Elyria City School District and the Maple Heights City School District. Mr. Toney also served as the Assistant Athletic Director at Steele, Seventh Grade Girls Basketball Coach, and Freshman Boys Baseball Coach.

Congratulations to Mr. Toney and welcome to the Steele family!

He earned his M.A. in Educational Leadership from Concordia University and holds administrative licenses for high school, middle school, and elementary school levels.

This past school year marked Mr. Toney's fifth year in the classroom and his second year at Nord Middle School. Prior to teaching in Amherst, he taught in the Elyria City School District and the Maple Heights City School District. Mr. Toney also served as the Assistant Athletic Director at Steele, Seventh Grade Girls Basketball Coach, and Freshman Boys Baseball Coach.

Congratulations to Mr. Toney and welcome to the Steele family!
